attributes.action: Vote of no Confidence in the Coalition and Labour's Opposition
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned and permanent residence of the United Kingdom and Great Britain demand the Government Resigns as off immediate effect. We the people are betrayed and we the people are feeling oppressed.

Many groups in Society, single parents, children school meals, pensioners, the disabled, working and middle class peoples livelihoods are all suffering, wages and job opportunities are collapsing.

We issued Downing Street with a list of our 7 key commands in April 2013 which, were ignored. We now issue this Vote of No Confidence.
